definition: devotion to the interests or culture of a particular nation including promoting the interests of one country over those of others, an advocate of national independence of or a strong national government
details:
adjective
- devotion to the interests or culture of a particular nation including promoting the interests of one country over those of others
= example: devotion to the interests or culture of a particular nation including promoting the interests of one country over those of others
= synonyms: nationalistic
noun
- an advocate of national independence of or a strong national government
- one who loves and defends his or her country
= synonyms: patriot
